languages.text: "За неучтивость пристыкуйте их в самом дальнем и ветхом шлюзе, чтобы топали по кораблю целую вечность".
"Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."
languages.original_text: "За неучтивость пристыкуйте их в самом дальнем и ветхом шлюзе, чтобы топали по кораблю целую вечность".

traits.locale_text: "Punish their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them forever to cross the ship."
"Punish their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them forever to cross the ship."
"Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

"Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

languages.text: “必须惩罚他们的傲慢态度。让他们在最远、最破旧的气闸附近停靠，让他们花很长时间才能穿过这艘船。”
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

traits.locale_text: “必须惩罚他们的傲慢态度。让他们在最远、最破旧的气闸附近停靠，让他们花很长时间才能穿过这艘船。”

languages.text: 「奴らの無礼な態度を懲らしめてやれ。船を運行するのに途方もなく時間がかかるような最も遠くて朽ち果てたエアロックに停留させてやるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らの無礼な態度を懲らしめてやれ。船を運行するのに途方もなく時間がかかるような最も遠くて朽ち果てたエアロックに停留させてやるんだ」

languages.text: « Pour leur faire payer leur manque de respect, faites-les s'amarrer au sas le plus éloigné et le plus délabré pour qu'ils mettent une éternité à traverser le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

traits.locale_text: « Pour leur faire payer leur manque de respect, faites-les s'amarrer au sas le plus éloigné et le plus délabré pour qu'ils mettent une éternité à traverser le vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Castíguelos por su falta de respeto haciendo que atraquen en la esclusa más lejana y deteriorada para que les lleve una eternidad cruzar la nave».
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Castíguelos por su falta de respeto haciendo que atraquen en la esclusa más lejana y deteriorada para que les lleve una eternidad cruzar la nave».

languages.text: "Bestraft ihre Respektlosigkeit, indem Ihr sie an der entferntesten und verfallensten Luftschleuse andocken lasst, sodass sie ewig brauchen, um das Schiff zu durchqueren."
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Bestraft ihre Respektlosigkeit, indem Ihr sie an der entferntesten und verfallensten Luftschleuse andocken lasst, sodass sie ewig brauchen, um das Schiff zu durchqueren."

languages.text: "En uzaktaki ve en yıkık bölmeye gönderin ki gemide yollarını kaybetsinler. Saygısızlıklarının cezasını çekmeleri lazım."
languages.original_text: "Punish them for their disrespect by letting them dock at the farthest and most dilapidated airlock so that it takes them an eternity to traverse the ship."
